entries.text: Initial commit. Project setup with Next.js 15.2.3 and Turbopack.
Added custom timeline component for visualizing deadlines and project milestones.
Implemented draggable nodes with customizable fields using @xyflow/react.
Added custom connection lines between nodes for better visual hierarchy.
Fixed bug with node drag behavior when connecting multiple inputs.
Improved node styling with hover states and better visual feedback.
Added context menu component for quick actions on nodes.
Fixed performance issues when rendering large node graphs.
Added loading spinner component for async operations.
Implemented life simulator component for tracking progress visualization.
Added [[https://github.com/emilkowalski/vaul|Vaul]] drawer component for the changelog.
Fixed accessibility issues with drawer component by adding proper ARIA attributes.
Refactored drawer component to position from right side and take up 30% of screen.
Improved animations for smoother transitions when opening and closing the changelog.
Added tooltip component using __@radix-ui/react-tooltip__ for better UX.
Updated graph component to show contribution history with proper date formatting.
Fixed text animation with [[https://windups.gwil.co/|windups]] library for typing effect.
Final polish: Updated changelog design with new Mar 2025 dates and project-specific log entries.
